cluster_information.name: Oven Cavity Operational State
cluster_information.description: This cluster provides an interface for monitoring the operational state of an oven.

PhaseList.description: As defined in the base cluster, this attribute indicates a list of names of different phases that the device can go through for the selected function or mode. For this derived cluster, only these pre-defined strings may be used in the PhaseList attribute: 'pre-heating', 'pre-heated', and 'cooling down'. Other values SHALL NOT be used. A null value indicates that the device does not present phases during its operation.

attributes.note: This cluster inherits all attributes from the Operational State cluster

commands.note: This cluster inherits all commands from the Operational State cluster

events.note: This cluster inherits all events from the Operational State cluster

phase_restrictions.description: Only these pre-defined strings may be used in the PhaseList attribute. Other values SHALL NOT be used.
